Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical

Class GraphicalCell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical.GraphicalCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharFigure
public class GraphicalCell
extends java.lang.Object
implements CharFigure

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GraphicalCell​(java.awt.Point position, CharStream stream, int RATIO_X, int RATIO_Y)
    This constructor initializes the GraphicalCell'stream used to print itself, its position on the GraphicalBoard, its lengths on the X/Y axis.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBuilding​(BuildingType buildingType)
    This method add a CharFigure building instance to the list of buildings on the GraphicalCell.
    void addBuildings​(java.util.List<BuildingType> buildings)
    This method add a CharFigure list of building instances to the list of buildings on the GraphicalCell.
    void draw()
    This method draws the GraphicalCell on the stream.
    void draw​(int relX, int relY)
    This method draws the GraphicalCell relatively to the GraphicalBoard.
    java.awt.Point getPosition()
    This method returns the position of the GraphicalCell on th GraphicalBoard.
    it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical.GraphicalWorker getWorker()
    This methods returns the GraphicalWorker on the cell, null if there isn't one.
    void removeWorker()
    This method removes the worker from the GraphicalCell.
    void setWorker​(java.lang.String workerID)
    This method sets the GraphicalWorker on the cell given the worker's id.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalCell

      public GraphicalCell​(java.awt.Point position, CharStream stream, int RATIO_X, int RATIO_Y)
      This constructor initializes the GraphicalCell'stream used to print itself, its position on the GraphicalBoard, its lengths on the X/Y axis.
      Parameters:
      position - is the position on th GraphicalBoard.
      stream - is the CharStream used to print itself.
      RATIO_X - is the length on the X axis.
      RATIO_Y - is the length on the Y axis.

  • Method Details

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(java.lang.String workerID)
      This method sets the GraphicalWorker on the cell given the worker's id.
      Parameters:
      workerID - is the String containing the worker's id.

    • getWorker

      public it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical.GraphicalWorker getWorker()
      This methods returns the GraphicalWorker on the cell, null if there isn't one.
      Returns:
      an instance of GraphicalWorker.

    • removeWorker

      public void removeWorker()
      This method removes the worker from the GraphicalCell.

    • getPosition

      public java.awt.Point getPosition()
      This method returns the position of the GraphicalCell on th GraphicalBoard.
      Returns:
      a Point with the X and Y coordinates.

    • addBuilding

      public void addBuilding​(BuildingType buildingType)
      This method add a CharFigure building instance to the list of buildings on the GraphicalCell.
      Parameters:
      buildingType - is the given BuildingType to add.

    • addBuildings

      public void addBuildings​(java.util.List<BuildingType> buildings)
      This method add a CharFigure list of building instances to the list of buildings on the GraphicalCell.
      Parameters:
      buildings - the given list of BuildingTypes to add.

    • draw

      public void draw()
      This method draws the GraphicalCell on the stream. Since GraphicalCells are always drawn relatively to the GraphicalBoard this method draws on the stream's default position.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface CharFigure

    • draw

      public void draw​(int relX, int relY)
      This method draws the GraphicalCell relatively to the GraphicalBoard.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface CharFigure
      Parameters:
      relX - is the relative X coordinate.
      relY - is the relative Y coordinate.
